arts.ttl: Chelsea's own Neymar? Maresca excited about 'fantastic' Estevao
arts.sum: Chelsea are very excited about the 2025 arrival of Estevao Willian. Maresca excited about Estevao

arts.ttl: The message Neymar reportedly sent Real Madrid stars on why Kylian Mbappe is ‘hell’ to play with
arts.sum: The French striker joined on a free transfer from PSG this past summer

arts.ttl: Neymar tells Real Madrid star Vinicius of “catastrophic war” and Kylian Mbappé “hell”
arts.sum: While Neymar’s friendship with Messi has been well known since their Barcelona days, the same can’t be said for new Real Madrid attacker Kylian Mbappé. On paper, an attacking trio of Neymar, Kylian Mbappé and Lionel Messi should’ve worked like a dream at Paris Saint-Germain.
